parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ error: 'unauthorized', status: 401, message: 'Invalid or expired admin token' }) }}

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  ul.id,
  ul.user_id,
  ul.limit_type,
  ul.limit_value,
  ul.current_usage,
  ul.reset_at,
  ul.created_at,
  ul.updated_at,
  u.username,
  u.first_name,
  u.last_name
FROM user_limits ul
LEFT JOIN users u ON ul.user_id = u.id
WHERE ($1::uuid IS NULL OR ul.user_id = $1)
ORDER BY ul.updated_at DESC;
